en.name: Hosted Exchange
en.description: Hosted Exchange provides a shared Microsoft Exchange system that is provided to customers with full domain administration privileges. The purpose of this service is to save the customer IT over head of installing, licensing and managing his own exchange environment. The service provides an advanced web accessible Email, Calendar and task management capabilities, it also offers full integration with Microsoft Outlook client.

en.name: WordPress
en.description:
WordPress is a web software you can use to create a beautiful website or blog.
It can be used for everything from simple websites, to blogs, to complex portals and enterprise websites, and even applications, are built with WordPress.

WordPress is known for it's simplicity and flexibility.

ar.name: WordPress
ar.short_description: اجعل موقعك الإلكتروني متاحاً على الإنترنت
ar.description:
WordPressهو برنامج ويب يمكنك استخدامه لإنشاء موقع أو مدونة إلكترونية .
ويمكن استخدامه لجميع الأنواع، بداية من المواقع الإلكترونية البسيطة، مروراً بالمدونات والبوابات الإلكترونية والمواقع الإلكترونية للمؤسسات، وحتى التطبيقات يتم تصميمها باستخدام WordPress؛
فهو معروف ببساطته ومرونته.

It also installs a load balancer to distribute the traffic among databases transparently and to allow ability to handle high traffic.

en.name: Web Server Cluster (LAMP)
en.short_description: An Apache cluster to host most common websites
en.description:
This service deploys a high availability web cluster of LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP).

It consists of 3 replicated MySQL databases, 2 replicated Apache servers, and 1 load balancer.
The cluster is designed to be suitable for most websites and web applications.
It is capable of handling intensive traffic depending on the plan.

ar.name: مجموعة خوادم الويب (LAMP)
ar.short_description: هي مجموعة Apache لاستضافة المواقع الإلكترونية الأكثر شيوعاً.
ar.description:
وتنشر هذه الخدمة مجموعة الويب (LAMP ) (التي تشير إلى الحروف الأولى للبرمجيات Linux، Apache، MySQL، PHP) بدرجة توافر عالية على الإنترنت.

وتتكون من 3 قواعد بيانات MySQL ذات نسخ مطابقة، وخادمين Apache ذي نسخ متطابقة، و load balancer واحد.
وصُمِّمت المجموعة لتلائم أغلب تطبيقات المواقع الإلكترونية وتطبيقات الويب.
كما أنها قادرة على معالجة الطلب المكثف.

en.name: Odoo ERP
en.description:
This service installs and configures a Odoo ERP environment ready to use in minutes.

Odoo is a comprehensive suite of business applications including Sales, CRM, Project management, Warehouse management, Manufacturing, Financial management, and Human Resources just to name a few. It is available in the cloud and is most suited for small to mid-sized companies.

With more than a thousand downloads/installations per day, Odoo is one of the most used open source solution in the world.

ar.name: Odoo ERP
ar.description:
توفر هذه الخدمة تثبيت وتهيئة بيئة خاصة بنظامOdoo ERP جاهزة للاستخدام في غضون دقائق.

 ويمثل Odoo مجموعة شاملة من تطبيقات الأعمال، حيث تتضمن، على سبيل المثال لا الحصر، المبيعات ونظام إدارة علاقات العملاء وإدارة المشروعات وإدارة المخزون والتصنيع والإدارة المالية والموارد البشرية. كما أنه يتوفر في السحابة ويكون الخيار الأمثل للشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة الحجم.
 ويعتبر نظام Odoo أكثر حل للمُستخدم من المصادر المفتوحة في العالم، بأكثر من ألف عملية تحميل/تثبيت يومياً.

en.name: Active Directory Environment
en.description:
With our Active Directory service, smart automation engine will build a complete Active Directory Environment within the Cloud for you without worrying about configurations,  network settings, virtual machines provisioning, fail-over configurations with single or multiple controllers.

A complete Active Directory environment will be ready for you with graphical representation to see all VMs and how they are connected with each others.

Such environment will save time and effort and will minimize errors related to configurations.

ar.name: Active Directory
ar.short_description: إدارة نظام Active Direcory الخاص بك
ar.description:
بشكل آلي سيتم إنشاء، (Active Directory) الخاصة بنا، بيئة كاملة لـ (Active Directory) في السحابة الخاصة بك، دون أن تشعر بالقلق من عمليات التهيئة أو إعدادات الشبكة أو توفير الخوادم أو النسخ الاحتياطية لأجهزة التحكم الفردية أو المتعددة.

وستكون البيئة الكاملة  (Active Directory) جاهزة لك بالتمثيل البياني لرؤية جميع الخوادم وطريقة اتصالها ببعضها البعض.

وستوفر هذه البيئة الوقت والجهد وستقلل الأخطاء المتعلقة بعمليات التهيئة إلى أدنى حد.

ar.short_description: تمر الرسائل الواردة للعملاء من خلال بوابات البريد الإلكتروني الآمنة الخاصة بالاتصالات السعودية-حلول، قبل وصولها إلى خوادم البريد الإلكتروني للعملاء
ar.description: فلترة رسائل البريد الإلكتروني الواردة من أيّ بريد إلكتروني مزعج أو فيروسات، وحفظ الرسائل الإلكترونية لمدة تصل إلى أسبوع في حالة تعطل خادم البريد الإلكتروني للعميل، وفحص محتوى ومرفقات الرسائل الإلكترونية الواردة للتخلص من الرسائل المزعجة والفيروسات، وتقليل تحميل الرسائل الإلكترونية على خادم البريد الإلكتروني للعميل، وحفظ الرسائل الإلكترونية لمدة أسبوع واحد في حالة تعطُّل خادم البريد الإلكتروني للعملاء، ثم إيصاله لهذا الخادم عند إعادة تشغيله.

en.description: Filter the incoming emails from spam and viruses as well as keep the emails for up to one week in case the customer email server is down, Scan incoming emails content and attachments for spam and viruses Reduces email load on the customer mail server, Spools email for one week if the customers mail server is down then deliver it when it is back

en.name: Elasticsearch
en.description: Elasticsearch is a search server based on Lucene. It provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents. Elasticsearch is developed in Java and is released as open source under the terms of the Apache License. Elasticsearch is the most popular enterprise search engine followed by Apache Solr, also based on Lucene.

ar.name: Elasticsearch
ar.description: خادم Elasticsearch هو خادم مخصص للبحث يستند إلى برنامج Lucene. وهو يقدم محرك البحث الكامل والموزع ومتعدد النص بواجهة ويب HTTP ومستندات JSON خالية من المخططات. وقد تم تطويره بلغة البرمجة جافا، وصدر باعتباره مصدراً مفتوحاً بموجب شروط رخصة Apache. كما أنه محرك البحث الأكثر شعبية للمؤسسات، يليه Apache Sol الذي يعتمد كذلك على Lucene.

en.name: Apache Solr
en.description:
Solr is the most popular, blazing-fast, open source enterprise search platform.

Solr is highly reliable, scalable and fault tolerant, providing distributed indexing, replication and load-balanced querying, automated failover and recovery, centralized configuration and more. Solr powers the search and navigation features of many of the world's largest internet sites.

ar.name: منصة Apache Solr
ar.description:
منصة Solr هي منصة البحث الأكثر شعبية والأسرع وهي المنصة ذات المصدر المفتوح للمؤسسات.

وهي منصة موثوق بها وقابلة للتوسع وذات قدرة على تحمُّل الخلل بدرجة كبيرة، مما يوفر فهرسة موزعة ونسخ للبيانات وطرح استفسارات عن load balancers وإصلاح الأعطال وإعادة التشغيل آلياً، والتكوين المركزي، وغيرها من المزايا. تُشغِّل منصة Solr ميزات البحث والتصفح للعديد من مواقع الإنترنت الأكبر على مستوى العالم.

en.name: ownCloud
en.short_description: Get a file sync and share server
en.description: ownCloud is a self-hosted file sync and share server. It provides access to your data through a web interface, sync clients or WebDAV while providing a platform to view, sync and share across devices easily — all under your control. ownCloud’s open architecture is extensible via a simple but powerful API for applications and plugins and it works with any storage.

 * التطبيقات المُثبَّتة في الخوادم 
 * إدارة نظام تشغيل الخوادم 
 * المشاكل المتعلقة بالشبكة الداخلية للعملاء
 * بيانات العملاء (استناداً إلى سياسة الأمان والخصوصية، لا يمكننا الوصول إلى البيانات في الخوادم/وحدات التخزين. ومن الضروري أن يؤكد العميل على أن لديه نسخة آمنة من بياناته وأنه احتفظ بنسخ احتياطية للخوادم/وحدات التخزين.

ar.name: الوثوقية وسرعة الاستجابة

en.name: Reliability and Resiliency

en.name: Security & compliance

ar.name: الرطوبة
ar.description: الحفاظ على مستويات مناسبة من الرطوبة المحيطة من أجل تحقيق أداء ووثوقية مُثلى

en.name: Humidity
en.description: Maintaining ambient relative humidity levels for optimal performance and reliability

en.name: ITCC Data Center
en.description:
The ITCC Datacenter is a first-class datacenter with best of breed and newest generation facilities providing high availability. ITCC datacenter is a Tier IV certified design from Uptime Institute, and is a Tier IV certified facility. 
The ITCC Datacenter is the most advanced datacenter in the region featuring the most advanced technologies. The ITCC Datacenter is equipped with fully redundant subsystems (power, Internet links, cooling, storage, etc.). The ITCC Datacenter is designed to host mission critical infrastructure and services and it provides guaranteed. ITCC has a wide variety of secure access control mechanisms including CCTV, fire alarm, security guards, biometrics. ITCC is located in Riyadh city.

ar.name: مركز بيانات (ITCC)
ar.description:
مركز بيانات مجمع تقنية المعلومات والاتصالات هو مركز البيانات الأول من نوعه الذي يضم أفضل أنواع من التطبيقات وتسهيلات من أحدث جيل، تُقدِّم أعلى معدل توافر. ومركز بيانات مجمع تقنية المعلومات والاتصالات هو حاصل على (Tier IV certified design) من Uptime Institute. 
مركز بيانات مجمع تقنية المعلومات والاتصالات هو مركز البيانات الأكثر تقدماً في المنطقة، حيث يتميز باحتوائه على التقنيات الأكثر تقدماً. كما أنه مُجَّهز بنظم فرعية إضافية متكاملة (الطاقة واتصالات الإنترنت والتبريد والتخزين، وما إلى ذلك). وصُمم مركز بيانات مجمع تقنية المعلومات والاتصالات لاستضافة الخدمات والبنية الأساسية بالغة الأهمية لأداء المهام، كما أنه يقدم خدمات مضمونة. يمتلك مجمع تقنية المعلومات والاتصالات آليات الأدوات الأمنية للدخول، بما في ذلك، أجهزة كاميرا المراقبة وإنذارات الحريق والحراسات الأمنية وأجهزة المقاييس الحيوية. ويقع مقر مجمع تقنية المعلومات والاتصالات في مدينة الرياض.

en.name: Jeddah Data Center
en.description:
Our Jeddah Data Center is also a Tier IV certified Design from Uptime Institute and is a Tier IV certified facility . It is equipped with fully redundant subsystems (power, Internet links, cooling, storage etc.) and it is more than robust enough for all of your Infrastructure needs. The Jeddah Data Center is designed to host mission critical infrastructure and services. 
The Jeddah Data Center has a variety of security access controls including CCTV, fire alarms, security guards.

ar.name: مركز بيانات موبايلي بجدة
ar.description:
مركز البيانات بجدة الخاص بنا هو أيضًا حاصل على (Tier IV certified Design) من Uptime Institute. ومُجَّهز بنظم فرعية إضافية متكاملة (الطاقة وروابط الإنترنت والتبريد والتخزين، وما إلى ذلك)، وقوي بما فيه الكفاية لتلبية جميع احتياجات البنية الأساسية الخاصة بك. صُمم مركز بيانات جدة لاستضافة الخدمات والبنية الأساسية بالغة الأهمية لأداء المهام. 
ويمتلك مركز بيانات جدة مجموعة متنوعة من الإدوات الأمنية للدخول، بما في ذلك، أجهزة كاميرا المراقبة (CCTV) وإنذارات الحريق والحراسات الأمنية.

en.name: Sulaimaniya Data Center
en.description: The Sulaimaniya Data Center has redundant capacity components, dual-powered equipment and multiple uplinks. The Sulaimaniya Data Center is an ISO 27001 certified Data Center. It has a variety of security access controls including CCTV, fire alarms and security guards. Sulaimaniya Data Center is located in Riyadh city.

ar.name: مركز بيانات السليمانية
ar.description: يمتلك مركز بيانات السليمانية redundant capacity components, dual-powered equipment and multiple uplinks. كما أن مركز بيانات السليمانية حاصل على شهادة ISO 27001. ويمتلك مجموعة متنوعة من الأدوات الأمنية للدخول، بما في ذلك، أجهزة كاميرا المراقبة وإنذارات الحريق والحراسات الأمنية. يقع مقر مركز بيانات السليمانية في مدينة الرياض.

en.name: Co-Location
en.short_description: Co-Location service allows our customers to host their IT infrastructure in relible, safe and cost effictive datacenter
en.description: STC Data Centers provide a variety of special services to host your IT infrastructure in a safe environment, ensuring availability and helping you further to develop your business. The STC Data Center conforms to international rules and regulations and applies only the best practices. The Data Centers main network has been set up using highly advanced network equipment. Moreover, our support team consists of network and security engineers and technician that are highly skilled and assure guaranteed service delivery. STC Data Centers have different levels of facility and design certifications to offer different options for our customers  based on their business needs.

 * Space
en.sla_uncovered_support:
* HW Installation

ar.name: استضافة الخوادم
ar.short_description: تتيح خدمة استضافة الخوادم لعملائنا حفظ البنية الأساسية لتقنية المعلومات الخاصة بهم في مركز بيانات موثوق به وآمن وذي تكلفة معقولة.
ar.description: توفر مراكز البيانات التابعة للاتصالات السعودية مجموعة من الخدمات الخاصة لحفظ البنية الأساسية لتقنية المعلومات الخاصة بك في بيئة آمنة، مما يضمن التوافر وتقديم مساعدة إضافية لك لتطوير أعمالك. ويتوافق مركز بيانات الاتصالات السعودية مع القواعد واللوائح الدولية، ولا يُطبِّق سوى أفضل الممارسات. وتم إعداد الشبكة الرئيسية لمركز البيانات باستخدام معدات شبكية على درجة عالية من التقدم. وعلاوة على ذلك، يتكون فريق الدعم لدينا من مهندسي وفنيِّ شبكات وأمن على درجة عالية من المهارة، ويعملون على تقديم خدمة مضمونة. وتمتلك مراكز البيانات الخاصة بالاتصالات السعودية مستويات مختلفة من التسهيلات وشهادات التصميم لتوفير خيارات مختلفة لعملائنا استناداً إلى متطلبات أعمالهم.
ar.sla_covered_support:
* التشغيل
 * التبريد
 * المساحة
ar.sla_uncovered_support:
* تركيب الأجهزة
 * توصيل الكابلات الداخلية
 * تثبيت البرامج
 * حامل توزيع الطاقة

faqs.question: What are PDU Connector Specifications?
faqs.answer: PDU Connector: IEC 309 32A. PDU Plug (PDU Side): IEC 60309 Cable Mount Plug 32A, 6H, IEC309. PDU Plug (DC Side): IEC 60309 Cable Mount Connector, 6H, IEC309. Poles / Wires: 2 Poles / 3 Wires. Voltage: 220 - 240 Volts AC. Amperage: 32 Amps.

faqs.question: What is the Rack Specifications?
faqs.answer: Maximum height is (1991 mm – 42 U), Maximum width is (600 mm), Maximum depth is (1200 mm), Maximum weight is (500 Kg./Rack)

faqs.question: What are the power requirements?
faqs.answer: STC offers Power Distribution Unit (PDU) diversity, independent AC systems, battery back-up, UPS and generators with guaranteed fuel contracts. Additionally, N+1 design enables uninterrupted service by safeguarding against equipment failure. Amperage: 32A/230V circuit breaker . Average Power: 4 kW.

ar.description: عند اشتراكك في اشتراك الميزات الإضافية هذه، يحق لك طلب خاصية الأمن لباقة إضافية أخرى. وصُمِّمت هذه الميزات الإضافية لتحقق مرونة الاشتراك وفقاً لمتطلباتك. تقدم الميزات الإضافية للأمن كخدمة (SECaaS) الأدوات الأمنية للدخول، وخدمات أمن مزود الإنترنت (IPS) وبرنامج Anti-DDoS الذي سيحمي من  (zero day attacks) . وبهذه الميزة الإضافية، يمكنك الاستفادة من حزمة الخدمات هذه للحماية من أنواع الهجمات المختلفة.

en.name: Policy add-on
en.description: By subscribing for this add-on subscription, you will be entitled to request security for one more additional policy. This add-on is specially designed to have the flexibility of subscription as per your requirement. SECaaS add-on provides security access control, IPS services and Anti-DDoS that will protect from both known and zero day attacks with very low latency. Under this add-on, you can avail this package of services to protect from different types of attacks.

تحميك خاصية الأمن كخدمة (SECaaS) من  (zero day attacks) من خلال.

en.name: Standard
en.description:
SECaaS secures access to your cloud infrastructure with firewall, IPS and anti-DDoS services. 

SECaaS protects you from both known and zero day attacks with very low latency.

ar.name: الأمن كخدمة – Standard : حتى 5 سياسات خدمة أمنية

en.name: SECaaS Standard : Upto 5 security service policies
Security as a Service
en.short_description: Security management for your hosted infrastructure
en.description:
Security as a Service (SECaaS) is a managed security service for existing IaaS customers providing a high level of protection. SECaaS, is much like security in your own on-premises data centers. 

In the cloud, you don't have to worry about securing your storage, your data or your applications. There are no upfront infrastructure investments. Our cloud security experts help to reduce your risk, enhance your compliance posture, and increase peace of mind.
en.sla_covered_support:
* To provide security controls for all the traffic data, in transit with the cloud infrastructure or colocation services.
* Protect your network from different types of attacks.
* Avail periodic reports at your convenience.
* Friendly customer support service available 24x7.
en.sla_uncovered_support:
* Any security configuration within the customer assigned private network.
* Incident related with the mis-configuration within the customer's network. 
* Remedial action for any vulnerability detected on customer's network.

ar.name: الأمن كخدمة
ar.short_description: إدارة الأمن للبنية الأساسية المحفوظة الخاصة بك
ar.description:
الأمن كخدمة (SECaaS) هو خدمة تأمين مدارة للبنية التحتية الحالية كخدمة للعملاء، وتوفر خدمة الأمن هذه أعلى مستوى حماية. والأمن كخدمة هو خدمة تشبه كثيراً الأمن في أماكن مراكز البيانات الخاصة بك. 

وعليك ألا تشعر بالقلق بشأن تأمين ما تخزنه أو بشأن بياناتك أو تطبيقاتك في الحوسبة السحابية. وليس هناك حاجة لاستثمارات أولية في البنية الأساسية. ويعمل خبراؤنا في أمن الحوسبة السحابية على الحد من المخاطر التي تتعرض لها، وتحسين امتثالك، ومنحك شعورًا أفضل براحة البال.
ar.sla_covered_support:
* توفير الضوابط الأمنية لجميع بيانات المرور، أو لنقل البنية الأساسية السحابية، أو لخدمات استضافة الخوادم.
* حماية شبكتك من أنواع الهجمات المختلفة.
* الاستفادة من التقارير الدورية في أيّ وقت يناسبك.
*توفير خدمة دعم العملاء على نحو ودي على مدار 24 ساعة يومياً.
ar.sla_uncovered_support:
* أيّ تكوين أمني في الشبكة الخاصة المحددة للعميل.
* عطل بسبب التكوين الخاطئ في شبكة العميل. 
* إجراء تصحيحي لأيّ خلل يتم اكتشافه في شبكة العميل.

faqs.question: Who can subscribe for SECaaS ?
faqs.answer: All the existing customers who are subscribed for Virtual DataCentres/IaaS services are eligible for subscribing SECaaS.

faqs.question: Why do you require SECaaS ?
faqs.answer: Businesses want to be able to focus on their core competencies instead of having to dedicate staff to becoming experts in deploying and managing network security. Customer business also want ensured reliability. The purpose for Cloud security services grows, however, businesses should increasingly combine multiple services for greater protection against threats. SECaaS combines firewall, intrusion detection services and anti-ddos protection for its valuable customers.

faqs.question: What are different plans available for SECaaS?
faqs.answer: SECaaS provides two plans; 1-- SECaaS Standard - This Plan provides you to provision upto five security policies. 2-- SECaaS Add-on - This Plan provides you the flexibility to subscribe for any additional policies required. In this plan the customer will be charged per policy.

services.approval_message:
1. Replace description with this (minor changes):
- Description -
WordPress is a Content Management System enabling you to create websites or blogs. Whether a complex portal or enterprise website, WordPress with its famous simplicity, power and flexibility will get the job done.

2. The three plan descriptions should reflect what is DIFFERENT about them, not just repeat what is the same (Sulaimaniya shown, Jeddah has similar issue). Maybe something like:

 Basic
6 virtual machines for high availability, economically configured for low traffic websites.

Standard
6 virtual machines for high availability resourced for medium traffic websites

Advanced
6 virtual machines for high availability with the power and storage needed for high traffic websites.

3. Is it necessary to have these strange plan names in Jeddah? Those names are there in the description, so couldn’t the plans be called Basic, Standard and Advanced? 
•	This really becomes a problem if the visitor uses the “Compare” function and gets things like a side-by-side comparison of “Standard” vs. “R1 Generic 4”, which are the middle-level plans at Sulaimaniya and Jeddah respectively. As I pointed out previously, this compare page also does not indicate whether the selected plans for comparison are in different DCs or in the same one. 
•	Please review my earlier feedback on the above around p. 15 of this document:
http://portal.stcs.com.sa/en/CloudServices/DMSCloudServices/Internal%20Software/MarketPlace-Ops/201610_ContentReview.docx

faqs.question: What is the maximum mailbox storage?
faqs.answer: The default mailbox storage is 2GB

faqs.question: What is the maximum size for an attachment?
faqs.answer: The maximum size for an attachment in the Exchange environment is 20MB.

faqs.question: What is Outlook Web Access (OWA)?
faqs.answer: Outlook Web Access or OWA is a way to access your email online from any computer. This can be useful if you’re not at home

faqs.question: What are the system requirements?
faqs.answer: Hosted Exchange 2016 works with the following operating systems: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 and Mac OS X. And with the following email platforms: Outlook 2010 with KB2965295, Outlook 2013, Outlook 2016, Outlook for Mac for Office 365 and Outlook 2011 Mac.

faqs.question: Which mobile platforms is Secure Hosted Exchange compatible with?
faqs.answer: Microsoft Hosted Exchange 2016 works with all major mobile platforms and includes spam and virus filtering. Apple iPhone, Windows Phone, Android, iPad and other tablets will all work with Secure Hosted Exchange.

faqs.question: Does the service support blackberry mobile device?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, blackberry is not supported currently, but we are planning to support it.

ar.short_description: تطبيق vTM من Brocade - موزع الأحمال كخدمة (LoadBalancer As A Service)
ar.description:
تطبيق Virtual Traffic Manager من Brocade هو جهاز تحكم في application delivery (ADC)، وصُمِّم لتقديم تجربة أداء عالٍ وسريع للمستخدم، مع وصول أكثر موثوقية للمواقع الإلكترونية العامة والتطبيقات الخاصة بالمؤسسات، وفي نفس الوقت تقديم أقصى قدر من فعَّالية وقدرة خوادم المواقع الإلكترونية والتطبيقات.
#### المزايا الأساسية:
- smart load balancers
- التحسين من سرعة الآداء
- التخزين المؤقت للمحتوى
- ميزة SSL و compression offload
- مراقبة مستوى الخدمة
- global load balancing
- إدارة سرعة البيانات
- نشر وتوزيع التطبيقات في الخوادم
- أتمتة الخدمة باستخدام REST API
- جهاز مزود بتقنية  (NFV) لـ application delivery
- Data Plane Acceleration mode 
High performance layer 4 services

en.name: Brocade Virtual Traffic Manager
en.short_description: Brocade vTM -  LoadBalancer As A Service
en.description:
Brocade Virtual Traffic Manager is a software-based application delivery 
controller (ADC) designed to deliver a faster and higher performance user 
experience, with more reliable access to public websites and enterprise 
applications, while maximizing the efficiency and capacity of 
web and application servers.
#### Key Features:
- Intelligent load-balancing
- Application acceleration
- Dynamic content caching
- SSL and compression offload
- Service-level monitoring
- Global load-balancing
- Bandwidth management
- Cloud bursting and balancing
- Service automation using REST API
- NFV Appliance for Application Delivery
- Data Plane Acceleration mode for 
high-performance Layer 4 services

faqs.question: For redundant plans, Why should I pay for 3 public IP's?

en.name: Web server cluster (LEMP)
en.short_description: An Nginx based cluster to host most common websites
en.description:
This service deploys an optimized high availability web cluster with the latest LEMP technologies: Linux, Nginx, MariaDB and PHP 7.

It consists of 3 replicated MariaDB databases and 3 replicated Nginx web servers with an HAproxy load balancer. The cluster is designed to be suitable for most websites and web applications. It is capable of handling intensive traffic based on the plan chosen.

ar.name: مجموعة خوادم الويب (LEMP)
ar.short_description: هي مجموعة Nginx لاستضافة المواقع الإلكترونية الأكثر شيوعاً.
ar.description:
تنشر هذه الخدمة مجموعة الويب المحسنة ذات درجة عالية من التوافر على الإنترنت بأحدث تقنيات LEMP: Linux وNginx وMariaDB وPHP 7.

وتتكون من 3 قواعد بيانات MariaDB ذات نسخ مطابقة، و 3 خوادم ويب Nginx ذات نسخ متطابقة، وload balancer HAproxy. وصُمِّمت المجموعة لتلائم أغلب تطبيقات المواقع الإلكترونية وتطبيقات الويب. كما أنها قادرة على معالجة الطلب المكثف اعتماداً على الباقة المختارة.

en.name: Cloud DNS
en.description: Bluvalt Cloud DNS is a reliable authoritative Domain Name System (DNS) service featuring high scalability and availability based on geographic location. BCDNS is fully self-managed DNS solution trusted by thousands of customers.
en.sla_covered_support:
* Service Availability
* Service Maintenance
* Service Upgrade
* Service Scalability
* Service Security
* Service backup
en.sla_uncovered_support: * Domain Registration

ar.name: نظام أسماء النطاقات السحابية (Cloud DNS)
ar.description: نظام أسماء النطاقات السحابية من Bluvalt هو خدمة رسمية موثوق بها فيما يخص نظام أسماء النطاقات (DNS)، وتتسم بقابليتها العالية للتوسع والتوافر استنادًا إلى الموقع الجغرافي. ونظام أسماء النطاقات السحابية من Bluvalt هو حل لنظام أسماء النطاقات السحابية مدار ذاتيًا بالكامل ويثق به آلاف العملاء.
ar.sla_covered_support:
* توافر الخدمة
* صيانة الخدمات
* ترقية الخدمة
* توسيع الخدمة
* تأمين الخدمة
* النسخ الاحتياطي للخدمة
ar.sla_uncovered_support: * تسجيل النطاق

فيمكنك زيادة مشاركة الموظفين التابعين لك وإنتاجيتهم، باستخدام تقنية مرنة وذات قدرات عالية وعلى أحدث طراز، تعتمد على خدمة المشاركة المستضافة من شركة Cisco.

ويُمكنك الانتقال إلى خدمة المشاركة السحابية للاتصالات السعودية بثقة وبدون أيّ تأثير على تجربة المُستخدِّم.

ابدأ اشتراكك بناءً على رقم المستخدمين والأجهزة المطلوبة، ثم اختر من خصائص المكونات الإضافية العديدة الخاصة بنا ما يلبي كل احتياجاتك.
***

en.name: Backup as a Service
en.description:
STC BaaS offering enables clients to achieve reliable and secure backup and recovery without any of the complexity and costs of buying the technology or managing the associated systems and processes. Because information availability and security are increasingly critical to meet strategic business objectives, customers require faster and more cost-effective solutions offered by STC to protect and manage their data.

### Key Features:
 
- Windows, Linux File System Backups.
    - File and folder level backup support for Microsoft Windows and common Linux distribution file systems
- System State Backup and Recovery.
    - Support for backup and recover of the System State on Microsoft Windows Server operating systems
- Application Integrated Backups.
    - Advanced application integrated backup and recovery support for common server applications
- Data Encryption.
    - All data protected by the service encrypted with Blowfish 128bit encryption as standard
- Self-Service Web Console
    - A rich and intuitive self-service web console user experience
- On-demand restore.
    - Initiate restores on demand via the self-service console
- On-demand backup
    - Initiate backups on demand via the self-service console
- Granular recovery
    - Perform granular recoveries of items from backup.
- Single Software for Backup, Archiving, Search, Compliance and mobility.
- Single task and copy for backup and archiving process with a single copy stored for. maximum level of integration and storage capacity reduction footprint.
- Desktop protection along with flexibility for end user access for self-service restore. using any desktop, portal and mobile securely.
- Source and target side deduplication without any specific hardware appliance.
- Hardware lock-in free, the solution should support any kind of hardware.
- Search and compliance across backup, archive and desktop for audit, legal hold purposes.
- Ability to manage array snapshot with application aware in order to take snapshot/clones application aware without admin efforts on scripting.

en.name: DRaaS
en.short_description: Continuing your business even after a disaster
en.description:
#**Disaster Recovery as-a-Service **
#
Downtime is more than just a technology issue. It can cost your business more than anticipated and in unexpected ways. Making sure your business stays on course, in case of a man-made or natural catastrophe, is not an easy task. To protect your environment, you could double your existing data center hardware and maintain all those resources on standby until needed or you may only be able to restore from old, slow and unreliable backups after an incident. The first is very expensive and the second is error-prone and causes extended downtime.

But these are not the only choices any more. With STC DRaaS (Disaster Recovery as a Service), your Recovery Site is running on a Virtual DC on the STC Cloud, so there is no Hardware cost, support, maintenance or DC facility cost. Your Recovery Site is hosted in the most advanced and certified Data Centers in the Kingdom.

DRaaS is a set of tools, tightly integrated with our vDC platform to provide data protection and recovery services to meet your business needs for data availability and accessibility. Your primary DC will have secure, real-time and continuous replication to the Recovery vDC, making it easy for you to fail-over or fail-back, Develop or test new applications on it, or even rewind to a point-of-time before a data corruption event, leaving your data intact. It works with both Windows or Linux in a physical or virtual environment.

With just a few clicks you can spin out or recover anything, from deleted files or objects to VMs, groups of servers or even the whole DC. You can periodically test how things would run in an actual disaster.
It's never been this simple and affordable to have a DR plan that is proven to work and meets your targets for near-zero RPO and minimal RTO.
en.sla_covered_support:
* Unplanned interruption of the real time replication
* GUI related issues
en.sla_uncovered_support:
* OS and application updates, service packs, fixes and any type of maintenance on the DR Site 
* Upgrade or update of software versions must be done in DR site also
* Any hardware, or software failure which occurs on the customer production site is out of STC responsibilities
* The monitoring of the replication or any network disconnection that may occur

faqs.question: What is RTO stand for ?
faqs.answer: The recovery time objective (RTO) is the targeted duration of time and a service level within which a business process must be restored after a disaster (or disruption) in order to avoid unacceptable consequences associated with a break in business continuity.

faqs.question: What is RPO stand for ?
faqs.answer: RPO (Recovery Point Objective) refers to the amount of data at risk. It's determined by the amount of time between data protection events and reflects the amount of data that potentially could be lost during a disaster recovery.

services.approval_message:
(Sending Word document by email so you can view change history)

Disaster Recovery As a Service (can this look like a H2 title? Bold and slightly larger?)

Downtime is more than just a technology issue. It can cost your business more than anticipated and in unexpected ways. Making sure your business stays on course, in case of a man-made or natural catastrophe, is not an easy task. To protect your environment, you could double your existing data center hardware and maintain all those resources on standby until needed or you may only be able to restore from old, slow and unreliable backups after an incident. The first is very expensive and the second is error-prone and causes extended downtime.

But these are not the only choices any more. With STC DRaaS (Disaster Recovery as a Service), your Recovery Site is running on a Virtual DC on the STC Cloud, so there is no Hardware cost, support, maintenance or DC facility cost. Your Recovery Site is hosted in the most advanced and certified Data Centers in the Kingdom.

DRaaS is a set of tools, tightly integrated with our vDC platform to provide data protection and recovery services to meet your business needs for data availability and accessibility. Your primary DC will have secure, real-time and continuous replication to the Recovery vDC, making it easy for you to fail-over or fail-back, Develop or test new applications on it, or even rewind to a point-of-time before a data corruption event, leaving your data intact. It works with both Windows or Linux in a physical or virtual environment.

With just a few clicks you can spin out or recover anything, from deleted files or objects to VMs, groups of servers or even the whole DC. You can periodically test how things would run in an actual disaster.

It's never been this simple and affordable to have a DR plan that is proven to work and meets your targets for near-zero RPO and minimal RTO.

-------------------------------------------

NOTE: Always spell out like this: [Disaster Recovery as a Service] – keep capitalization consistent and don’t add hyphens in one place (the title to the intro) but not another (the plan description).

NOTE: The word is [terabyte] one word and not capitalized unless part of a title or name. Terra means “earth” as in terra firma (dry land). Tera Byte, as two words is not correct. Correct it in three places: pricing, add-ons and FAQs.

NOTE: In pricing, most of them are specified like:
[Per Number of Man Day]

This is not correct. If you must use “number of”, then the noun (e.g., “day”) must be plural:
[Per Number of Man-days]      (these terms should be hyphenated)

But, it would be much better to state it as:
[Per Man-day]

The “title” capitalization you’re using is awkward especially with these hyphenated terms where the second word should not be capitalized. The whole thing would look much better with capitalization only on the first word like a sentence as follows:
Per man-day – PS Central Region
Per man-day – PS outside Central Region
Per socket
Per terabyte
Per node for DR management
 
Features
•	Real-time Continuous Replication
•	No Lock-in
•	Minimal RPO and RTO
•	Easy to Manage and Operate
•	DR Drills and Reports
•	Low Entry Cost
•	Easy Startup
•	Supports Physical Server
•	Supports Virtual Servers


Not Covered by Support
•	OS and Application updates, services pack, fixes and any type of maintenance on the DR Site
•	Upgrade or update of software versions must be done in DR site also
•	Any hardware or software failure which occurs on the customer production site is out of STC responsibilities
•	The monitoring of the replication or any network disconnection that may occur

en.name: Hosted Private Cloud
en.description:
VMware on STC Cloud enables customers in Saudi Arabia to run a full featured and dedicated Software-Defined Data Center (SDDC) securely from STC's award winning datacenters.

The STC cloud era is changing line-of-business (LOB) expectations of IT. For IT organizations to securely deliver the anticipated improvements in service quality and time-to-market requirements, the SDDC approach is a must. VMware SDDC delivers a unified platform that supports any application, provides flexible control and empowers organizations to run private or hybrid clouds by leveraging its unique capabilities to enable efficiency, agility, and security.

فيمكنك زيادة مشاركة الموظفين التابعين لك وإنتاجيتهم، باستخدام تقنية مرنة وذات قدرات عالية وعلى أحدث طراز، تعتمد على خدمة المشاركة المستضافة من شركة Cisco.

ويُمكنك الانتقال إلى خدمة المشاركة السحابية للاتصالات السعودية بثقة وبدون أيّ تأثير على تجربة المُستخدِّم.

ابدأ اشتراكك بناءً على رقم المستخدمين والأجهزة المطلوبة، ثم اختر من خصائص المكونات الإضافية العديدة الخاصة بنا ما يلبي كل احتياجاتك.
***
شاهد هذا  [الفيديو](https://youtu.be/YxjCj924nXY) للمزيد من المعلومات.

الحد الأدنى للاشتراك: 250 مستخدم

en.name: Vormetric Transparent Encryption
en.short_description: Encryption & Data Leakage Protection for Files&Database
en.description:
Thales Vormetric Transparent Encryption VTE protects what matters most: YOUR DATA. The solution encrypts data-at-rest within your STC Cloud instances, provides policy-based data access control, integrated key management, and detailed Security Intelligence information about data access patterns. 

The solution is transparent to applications and to system management processes making it easy to deploy and operate. Data is only accessible by authorized users and processes; therefore, policy can allow privileged users (even cloud administrators) to manage systems without the risk of them having visibility to the data.

Encrypt and Protect data of any kind, files, folders, volumes and/or even databases. Access and Security policies along with encryption key management are provided by the Vormetric Data Security Manager (VDSM). VDSM is a web based management portal  that will allow you to create, manage and store your encryption keys in a FIPS 104-2 certified vault.

VTE agents are licensed per host meaning that every Virtual Machine Instance would need one license.

en.description:
A one-stop shop for Contact Center services provided by Pioneers Outsourcing, which includes the contact center system and professional services such as Quality Assurance, Workforce Management, Scheduling and Multi-skill agents. In addition to integration capabilities with your internal systems like CRMs. 


Whatever your requirements, we are ready to help. Our engineers and operations experts work to design a solution that meets your unique business requirements. You never have to worry about upgrades and maintenance with your contact center solution, our team will take care of that for you while you focus on your core business.

**Terms and Conditions:**

The hiring and training period is 10 days from request submission.

You can cancel your Managed Manpower add-ons at any time during the pilot period (first 3 months). Otherwise you must apply 30 days notification before cancellation.

ar.description:
مركز خدمات متكامل لتقديم خدمات مركز الاتصال من شركة رواد الاسناد، الذي يتضمن نظام مركز الاتصال والخدمات المهنية، مثل، ضمان الجودة وإدارة القوة العاملة وتحديد المواعيد ووكلاء بمهارات عديدة؛ بالإضافة إلى القدرات المتكاملة مع نظمك الداخلية، مثل نظام إدارة علاقات العملاء. 


ومهما كانت متطلباتك، فنحن على استعداد لتقديم المساعدة؛ حيث يعمل المهندسون وخبراء العمليات لدينا على تصميم حل لتحقيق متطلبات أعمالك الفريدة. وعليك ألا تشعر بالقلق بشأن التحديثات والصيانة لمركز الاتصال الخاص بك، حيث سيتولى فريقنا العناية بذلك لأجلك، بينما تركز أنت على أعمالك الرئيسية.

**الأحكام والشروط:**

مدة التشغيل والتدريب هي 10 أيام من تاريخ إرسال الطلب.

بإمكانك إلغاء المكونات الإضافية لإدارة القوة العاملة في أيّ وقت خلال الفترة التجريبية (أول ثلاثة أشهر). خلافًا لذلك، يجب عليك تقديم إشعار قبل 30 يوماً من الإلغاء.

faqs.question: I have IP phones, will you system work with my IP phones?
faqs.answer: Our platform is a complete call center solution and you can simply configure your IP phone with required SIP configurations.

faqs.question: Do you offer trials?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can simply send us your request at caas-trails@pioneers-outsourcing.com, and we will respond within 24 hours from submitting your request.

faqs.question: What do I need to activate my service?
faqs.answer: Nothing really! You just need to select your suitable package plan and billing period. The rest will be handled by our experts.

faqs.question: What key performance indicators will be used to judge the effectiveness of my service?
faqs.answer: Specific KPI are established for each client after consultation and pilot period. As an example, SLA, average handling time, average speed of answer, quality accuracy, total talk time, average waiting time, .. etc.

faqs.question: Will the agents working for me also be working for other clients at the same time?
faqs.answer: No, each agent is assigned to work exclusively for one client at a time. Our goal is for you to view our agents as dedicated extension of your office staff.

faqs.question: Can I monitor\evaluate agents calls?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have the supervisor evaluation and monitoring tool which helps you to ensure your customers satisfaction from the provided service

faqs.question: If I have some questions before I start, what should I do?
faqs.answer: If you are ready to get started but you have additional questions, please email us at sales@pioneers-outsourcing.com and we will be delighted to discuss your thoughts/concerns!

faqs.question: Do your agents receive continuing training throughout the year?
faqs.answer: One of our core objectives is to consistently provide ongoing training for both our agents and our team leaders and coaches throughout the year. Ongoing training is done through one-to-one, focus groups, formal classroom and procedural updates on our client services\products.

faqs.question: What types of training programs are in-place that must be mastered by your agents prior to taking client calls?
faqs.answer: Every agent goes through intensive new-hire training focusing on soft-skills and personal development. Additionally, all agents go through client specific training before taking program calls. Client specific training varies based on each client’s goals and objectives. All agents must pass written exams and certification testing before taking live program calls.

faqs.question: Do you have multilingual capabilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have bilingual agents who are fluent in Arabic and English. With our custom designed recruiting and on-boarding process we can source, recruit, and train any agents needed!

faqs.question: Does your contact center support 24/7 operations?
faqs.answer: Yes we operate 24 hours a day, seven days a week including holidays.

faqs.question: Is a system like this reliable and secure?
faqs.answer: Our cloud based system ensures the highest reliability because it operates on carrier grade hardware that resides in security patrolled, disaster-proof facilities.

faqs.question: What happens if we need to substantially grow our call center project in the near future or have big seasonal peaks?
faqs.answer: Pioneers Contact Center Service is built to scale to your changing needs. In fact, this is one of the strengths of the “design” of the hosted cloud computing model. Whether your business plan calls for you to add or remove remote agents to grow or to handle peaks, we can seamlessly meet your evolving business requirements, more affordably and faster than you may think possible. Our system provides a truly “on demand” scalability, enabling us to ramp up or down to meet business needs. And, since we operate on a fully hosted, Internet-based solution, we will never need to upgrade hardware or software to support your needs.

faqs.question: What about integrating Pioneers Contact Center Service with our existing application systems?
faqs.answer: Every customer can leverage our call center “in the cloud” using built-in web solutions technology to enable advanced software integrations with other applications and solutions. Call center developers and IT professionals can use the cloud APIs to integrate with home-grown CRM applications, create custom agent desktops, use integration frameworks to create unified agent desktops, retrieve data from external systems for call routing, and more. Since the call center APIs are web services, they are available to be used by the widest possible range of cloud computing and premise-based applications, and developers using the APIs can create code in their preferred development environment.

faqs.question: Can your service connect with agents anywhere?
faqs.answer: Yes, with our “cloud based” VoIP telephony and web-based software, agents can log in anywhere, with just an Internet connection at a home office or business location.

faqs.question: Why is the Pioneers Contact Center Service a good technology choice?
faqs.answer: Our contact center system is hosted, meaning all software and hardware runs in secure, remote, redundant data centers, and our agents, staff and management access the system using the internet, requiring only a PC, a broadband internet connection and USB headset. Because this is a “hosted service”, you don’t have to sustain the cost and complexity of building and maintaining a premise-based system. It can be expanded and reconfigured quickly.

en.name: EduWave K-12
en.description:
EduWave K-12 is a comprehensive education platform that was built to assist schools and school districts in improving student learning and achievement, and help students, teachers, administrators, parents, and the whole learning community become more efficient, effective and productive. 

The award winning education platform, EduWave K-12, is one of the most powerful and complete educational platform available in the market which seamlessly integrates Learning Management System (LMS), Student Information System (SIS), Assessment Management System (AMS), and Communication and Collaboration Tools (CC), into one easy to use solution that is hosted in the (Cloud). EduWave K-12 is also one of the very few products available that is built to accommodate schools and districts to combine their complex needs into a fully-integrated, powerful, consolidated and simple solution. EduWave K-12 can be provided as a complete solution, and can be integrated with other systems running at the school. 

EduWave K-12 provides an unmatched accessibility and flexibility platform that can be customized to any school and any budget, schools can use the combined solution or use specific functionality that can seamlessly integrate with other systems and third-party applications.

Why EduWave K-12? 

* Integrates seamlessly with other systems. 
* Easy to use; less training and faster staff adoption. 
* Supports multiple languages. 
* Reduces cost; offers an off-premise (cloud) deployment. 
* Compatible with the various browsers and mobile devices. 
* Enhances decision making through intelligent reporting, dashboards, and information analysis. 
* Customizes permissions; create special roles. 
* Designed for schools, school districts, and even statewide deployments. 
* Content authoring. 
* Based on learning (common core) standards. 
* Highly secure. 
* Complete set of communication and collaboration tools available to use or to integrate with. 
* Flexible and configurable. 
* Available LMS, SIS, and CC from single provider makes more seamless integration possible. 
* Based on industry standards.
en.sla_covered_support:
EduWave mission is to provide a system that can be easily operated without any difficulties in functioning. Although sometimes issues might occur, EduWave and through it is built in support and help desk function provides a quick and effective way to solve issues by:

* Search the online help documents for the issue, problem, or question 
* Access the Video Tutorials on how to achieve a certain task or configuration, or register for a session online. 
* Access the FAQs for relevant topics.
* Access Forums so that the user can:
a. Interact with other peers to discuss the issue
b. Interact with the public and ask questions about a  certain issue
c. Participate in the general discussions 
* Create a ticket, where the user can fill out a form explaining the problem or the issue which he/she currently facing in addition he/she will have the option to attach screen shots
en.sla_uncovered_support:
* Face to face training
* Onsite support

faqs.question: How do I submit a ticket to report defects or request feature improvements, etc.?
faqs.answer: ITG maintains outstanding levels of support and customer satisfaction through allowing users to submit tickets regarding billing, sales, technical issues, and general issues, and you can track them through “My Tickets” page. To submit a ticket,  1) Hover over your username at the top-right of the menu bar. 2) Click Submit Ticket, 3) Enter the ticket’s subject. 4) Select the ticket’s priority and type, each from its respective menu. 5) Enter the ticket’s description, and you can control its appearance using the available toolbar. 6) Attach a file to the ticket, if you want, by clicking [Choose Files] then choosing the required file(s); keep in mind you can attach up to a maximum of 7 files and finally, click [Submit Ticket].

faqs.question: How do I contact EduWave Support?
faqs.answer: ITG’s support officers and experts are armed with technical knowledge and problem solving abilities that allow them to achieve the best results and minimum unplanned systems’ downtimes, all in line with the projects’ size, nature and objectives, and within standard procedures. To submit a ticket with the issue or inquiry you have to the Support team, you can use “My Tickets” page or contact the Support team at the phone numbers and emails available in the “Contact Us” page.

faqs.question: What browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: This portal and EduWave products are cross-browser compatible; i.e. they work with all versions of all available browsers. If you noticed any unstable functionality; whether on the portal or any product, submit a ticket

faqs.question: How do I renew my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can renew any of your subscriptions, if available, only after it is expired or after you cancel it. Follow these steps: 1.	Hover over your username at the top-right of the menu bar, 2.	Click Subscription Details, 3.	Click Renew next to the required subscription, 4.	Proceed with the payment and placing the order. When you are done, your selected subscription is renewed.

faqs.question: How can schools benefit from LMS?
faqs.answer: Check our School's LMS package to read more about the features provided.

faqs.question: What can EduWave provide the school?
faqs.answer: Check our School's full package.

faqs.question: What can EduWave provide me as a Teacher?
faqs.answer: Check our Teacher's package.

faqs.question: Is LMS the same as SIS?
faqs.answer: Student Information System (SIS) should not be confused with learning management systems (LMS). Where LMS provides a portal for coursework and class resources, SIS serves as a data management system for higher-level student information. Check what EduWave LMS and SIS provide you.

faqs.question: How do I learn about EduWave and where can I find documentation, training materials, videos, etc.?
faqs.answer: •	How to Guides: By clicking Help at the bottom of any page in the portal you can view visual and audio files which represent a helpful tutorial for the teachers, parents, and students on how to do several actions through EduWave. To view the related tutorials to a certain user type, click its respective link. •	Quick Start Guides: Here you can find a quick start guide for the Teacher and Student to help you understand how to use a couple of pages and features •	Access the Online Forums to check all subjects discussed about EduWave, the portal, and other related stuff.

faqs.question: My email address has changed. How do I notify you of this?
faqs.answer: 1.	Hover over your username at the top-right of the menu bar, 2.	Click Subscription Details, 3.	Click edit your password and account details, 4.	Enter your new email in the respective field instead of the old one, 5.	Click [Save Changes].

faqs.question: Why did I not get an email when I changed my password?
faqs.answer: Check your junk mail folder and make sure your IT or browser do not block eduwaveportal@itgsolutions.com. If you have received an email notifying you of changing your password, and you did not change it, please contact the Site’s Administrator at the provided email address.

faqs.question: How do I change my password?
faqs.answer: Follow these steps: 1.	Hover over your username at the top-right of the menu bar, 2.	Click Subscription Details, 3.	Click edit your password and account details, 4.	Enter your current password, 5.	Enter your new password and its confirmation, each in its field; keep in mind they must match, 6.	Click [Save Changes].

faqs.question: How do I stay up to date on new releases, events, and news?
faqs.answer: Users can stay up to date on new releases, upcoming events, and general EduWave news by subscribing to our newsletter. You will receive a message that confirms your subscription to the Integrated Technology Group (ITG) newsletter. If you want to unsubscribe after subscribing to the newsletter, click the respective link in the same message. Also, if you want to change the email address by which you are subscribing to the newsletter, click the respective link, enter the new email, click [Save], and then confirm this change using the link sent to this new email. Users also can check the News page on the portal on a regular basis, and follow EduWave on the social media outlets below: Twitter LinkedIn Facebook

faqs.question: How do I sign up for the newsletter?
faqs.answer: All you have to do to get our latest news and updates delivered to your email is to enter your email in the respective field at the bottom of any page on the portal, and then click [Subscribe]. To confirm your subscription you'll receive a confirmation email. Please follow the link in the email to confirm your subscription. If the email takes more than 15 minutes to arrive in your inbox, please check your spam folder.

services.approval_message:
Please consider these minor suggested changes (also sent by email attachment for better formatting):

- Description -
CORRECT ITg to ITG wherever found (e.g., the “name” of the product in Marketplace
 

EduWave K-12 is a comprehensive education platform that was built to assist schools and school districts in improving student learning and achievement, and help students, teachers, administrators, parents and the whole learning community become more efficient, effective and productive.
The award-winning education platform, EduWave K-12, is one of the most powerful and complete educational platforms available in the market which seamlessly integrates Learning Management System (LMS), Student Information System (SIS), Assessment Management System (AMS), and Communication and Collaboration Tools (CC) into one easy to use solution that is hosted in the (Cloud). EduWave K-12 is also one of the very few products available that is built to accommodate schools and districts combining their complex needs into a fully-integrated, powerful, consolidated and simple solution. EduWave K-12 can be provided as a complete solution and can also be integrated with other systems running at the school.
EduWave K-12 provides a platform, unmatched in accessibility and flexibility, that can be customized to any school and any budget. Schools can use the combined solution or use specific functionality that can seamlessly integrate with other systems and third-party applications.
Why EduWave K-12?
•	Integrates seamlessly with other systems.
•	Easy to use; less training and faster staff adoption.
•	Supports multiple languages.
•	Reduces cost; offers an off-premise (cloud) deployment.
•	Compatible with the various browsers and mobile devices.
•	Enhances decision making through intelligent reporting, dashboards, and information analysis.
•	Customized permissions; create special roles.
•	Designed for schools, school districts, and even statewide deployments.
•	Content authoring.
•	Based on learning (common core) standards.
•	Highly secure.
•	Complete set of communication and collaboration tools available to use or to integrate with.
•	Flexible and configurable.
•	Available LMS, SIS, and CC from single provider makes more seamless integration possible.
•	Based on industry standards.

Covered by Support
EduWave’s mission is to provide a system that can be easily operated and function without any difficulties. Although sometimes issues might occur, EduWave, through it is built in support and help desk function, provides a quick and effective way to solve issues. You can:
•	Search the online help documents for the issue, problem, or question
•	Access the Video Tutorials on how to achieve a certain task or configurations or register for a session online.
•	Access the FAQs for relevant topics.
•	Access Forums so that the user can: a) Interact with peers to discuss the issue b) Interact with the public and ask questions about a certain issue or c) Participate in the general discussions
•	Create a ticket, where the user can fill out a form explaining the problem or the issue which he/she is currently facing. In addition he/she will have the option to attach screen shots
Not Covered by Support
•	Face to face training

What browsers are supported?

This portal and EduWave products are cross-browser compatible; i.e. they work with all versions of all available browsers. If you notice any unstable functionality, whether on the portal or any product, please submit a ticket


How do I submit a ticket to report defects or request feature improvements, etc.?

ITG maintains outstanding levels of support and customer satisfaction through allowing users to submit tickets regarding billing, sales, technical issues, and general issues, and you can track them through My Tickets page. 1) Hover over your username at the top-right of the menu bar, 2) Click Submit Ticket, 3) Enter the ticket’s subject, 4) Select the ticket’s priority and type, each from its respective menu, 5) Enter the ticket’s description, and you can control its appearance using the available toolbar, 6) Attach a file to the ticket, if you want, by clicking [Choose Files] then choosing the required file(s); keep in mind you can attach up to a maximum of 7 files. Finally, click [Submit Ticket].


How do I contact EduWave Support?

ITG’s support officers and experts are armed with technical knowledge and problem solving abilities that allow them to achieve best results and minimum unplanned systems downtime, all in line with the projects’ size, nature and objectives, and within standard procedures. • Submit a Ticket: you can submit a ticket with the issue or inquiry you have to the support team Here, and you can track it through My Tickets page. • Call or Send an Email: the Support Team can be reached at the phone numbers and emails available in the CONTACT US page.


Note: it looks like the bullet points should have been on new lines and the word “Here” with a capital ‘H’ is probably supposed to be a link (I don’t know if it is possible to make links in this context)? Perhaps Marketplace mangled your formatting? As is, it is confusing and unclear. Can we come up with something that “works” in this presentation? If it is possible to make the bullets on new lines, you could put a colon ‘:’ after “procedures” and that would help a lot. If we can’t put the bullets on new lines, maybe we can make them more visible.


Note about plans:
Not to interfere in your business model or anything, but having once been a teacher, I probably would have been quite interested in paying 149 SAR per year for a single-user version just for my own use. I’m not so sure I would have been able to find 9 colleagues to go together on the minimum 10-user configuration! Just a thought. If multi-tenancy is fully implemented, that shouldn’t affect your bottom line too much and might bring in more customers.
If purchasing a single-user license is already possible, then the wording needs to be changed and the “starting from” change to 149 SAR. If ten is required, then it doesn’t really fulfill the promise of the plan description:
Eduwave Teacher Plan
You teach at a school that doesn't have a teaching platform! No worries; this package is tailored especially for you

faqs.question: Can I edit my form after it is published?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can always make changes to your form. If you have already collected results and need to make major changes to the form, we recommend making a copy to keep the old form and its results intact. You can then change the Directory for both forms on the "Share" page to keep the form link the same.

faqs.question: Are form submissions stored in a database?
faqs.answer: Yes, Enmothj allow you to export your form submissions as an Excel spreadsheet or a CSV file, which you can then import into another database (or open in Excel).

faqs.question: How do I see the data that people submit to my form?
faqs.answer: Copy of each submission is also stored on our platform, so you can view your form submissions report

faqs.question: Do I need to know HTML, or do any “programming” to create my form?
faqs.answer: Not at all. We have an easy-to-use form builder that lets you create fields and give them labels. You can specify which fields are required.

en.name: VOOST Analytic
en.short_description: VOOST Location analytic and Marketing platform
en.description:
VOOST analytic is a brand name that emphasizes experiences in the wireless based analytic products and services.

The main purpose behind the development of VOOST is to drive revenue by focusing on opportunities in the wireless intelligent services.

VOOST highlights the new analytic capabilities that allow organizations to understand how end users interact with their environment online, onsite, and socially. 

VOOST analytic is an enterprise grade platform for analyzing in-venue customer patterns based on wireless access points.

Think of our solution as a combination of Google Analytic and marketing automation platform.

Note: Subscription plans to VOOST is including only Access points and VOOST application services, It is not including switches, cabling fees nor SMS bundle.

ar.name: منصة VOOST Analytic
ar.description:
VOOST analytic هو اسم تجاري يمتلك خبرات في المنتجات والخدمات التحليلية القائمة على الاتصالات اللاسلكية.

الغرض الرئيسي من تطوير منصة VOOST هو تعزيز نمو الإيرادات من خلال التركيز على الفرص في الخدمات الذكية القائمة على الاتصالات اللاسلكية.

وتسلط منصة VOOST الضوء على القدرات التحليلية الجديدة، التي تتيح للمنظمات فهم كيفية تفاعل المستخدمين النهائي مع بيئتهم على الإنترنت وفي الموقع وعلى المستوى الاجتماعي. 

ومنصة VOOST هي واحدة من المنصات الخاصة بفئة المؤسسات والمعنية بتحليل أنماط العملاء في المواقع بناءً على نقاط الاتصال اللاسلكية.

فكِّر في الحل الخاص بنا باعتباره يجمع بين منصة Google Analytic للأتمتة التسويقية والتحليلية.

ملحوظة: تتضمن خطط الاشتراك في منصة VOOST خدمات نقاط الاتصال وتطبيقات VOOST فقط، ولا تتضمن رسوم مبدلات الشبكات أو توصيل الكابلات أو باقة الرسائل.

faqs.question: What is the ROI for using INDORSE CLOUD?
faqs.answer: The average cost of signing paper document is SAR 20.00. The Average cost of the Subscription PRO based on 500 documents per year is SAR 6.00. The Average cost of the Subscription Lite based on 50 documents per year is SAR 6.00. The ROI is 20.00 / 6.00 * 100 = 333.33%

faqs.question: Are INDORSE CLOUD Services compliance with the local and International laws?
faqs.answer: Yes, they are fully compliance with the Saudi e-Transaction act and other International laws and regulations.

faqs.question: What document formats will INDORSE CLOUD work with?
faqs.answer: Any Document that can be converted into PDF can be processed using the service. Adobe Acrobat Reader can use digital certificate and makes is very easy to verify the certificates from the same document. No need to install extra software.

faqs.question: How does INDORSE CLOUD Authenticates Users?
faqs.answer: At a minimum, we use 2-Factor authentication. We also offer an optional third biometric factor for extra security. For 2-Factor, we use soft-token using advanced technologies from Entrust Datacard. Our optional Third-Factor, is the biometric verification of the hand captured-signature using Microsoft Ink.

faqs.question: Are digital signatures legally enforceable?
faqs.answer: INDORSE CLOUD digital signatures are as legally binding as “wet” signatures and are globally acceptable, enabling anyone, anywhere at any time to verify the signer’s identity and intent, and ensure that the document has not been tampered with since it was signed off.  Most jurisdictions worldwide including Saudi Arabia have digital signature legislation. They recognize the legality of a digital signature (standard electronic signature) and deem it a binding signature.

faqs.question: Why digital Signature?
faqs.answer: For years many organizations have aspired to the paperless office. Many technologies have been introduced to try and achieve this; document management for effective storage of data, workflow to improve processes, databases to hold client information... the list goes on. All of these systems hit the paper barrier when a document needs to be signed or approved; we print the document and sign it. We are left with a complete, but analogue document in a digital world. To make it digital we then scan the document back into the digital arena, but file the paper as it is the original. The process introduces many issues and costs.

faqs.question: Where INDORSE CLOUD store my documents?
faqs.answer: INDORSE CLOUD stores documents in STC data centers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

faqs.question: What do I need to do before you cancel your subscription or your add-on?
faqs.answer: Before you cancel your subscription or add-on you need to do the following:  1. Download all your contents to your desktop.  2. Delete all your contents in INDORSE CLOUD.  3. Delete all your contents in INDORSE CLOUD Trash.

faqs.question: How do you ensure that the data is secured in mbas?
faqs.answer: To achieve the economies of scale, mbas uses "Multi-tenancy".  Multi-tenancy makes customers to run their application on the same unit of software.  The data is stored in one database. This makes overall system scalable, very easy with lower cost.  There will be a definite doubt on losing the data or security of data. Today, any tier 4 technology data centers deliver security of data. The agreements made are legally binding and protect business interests of all stakeholders.

faqs.question: What is the time frame required for mbas service to up and run for a customer?
faqs.answer: mbas smart solutions are been provided with Organization and business configurators Organization configurators guides the user / admin to set up organization related global information along with users creation along with security settings for users Similarly, business configurators help users to enter the pre-requisites required for the processes to run. The business configurators include both the master and opening balances data which are pre-requisite for the processes to up and run. The system is being provided with uploading facility of data through pre-defined excel templates which can be filled for master data to be migrated to mbas application The online help will guide users to understand the way in which the data entry is to be done

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the mbas Smart Retail?
faqs.answer: Online POS capability maintaining opening & closing of till Devise agnostic feature integrates Cash drawers, Display Poles, printers & all kind of plastic & debit/Credit card reading machines. Monitors inbound outbound logistics leading to reduction in operation cost. Distributions enabled through inter stock transfers. Reduced procurement cycle time and increased productivity. Simple data feeding and analytical reports for the entire order to cash cycle Configurable payroll configuration and country specific salary sheet generation Easy to maintain accounting with GL, AR, AP and FY closure Integration across application processes and automatic posting from other modules

faqs.question: How mbas Smart Retail solution will add advantage to enterprises?
faqs.answer: Retail industries around the world face challenges streamlining their point of sales terminals to maintain data transparency and to strategize their decision making and supply chain capability to meet the areas wise demand of all stores enabling quick replenishment of right stock. Industries expect seamless integration of business functions, robust processes in the current modern technology enabled world which is offered by mbas Smart Retail solution.   Online POS technology with device agnostic features with processes to obtain information on slow and non-moving inventory enhance purchasing & sales deal making decision, maintaining optimum inventory store wise & warehouse wise with reduced inventory cost is an added advantage for the enterprises.

faqs.answer: •Employee management maintains the entire data required for the employees •Facility to make multiple Payroll groups and CTC Templates. •Tracking of employees Daily and Consolidated Attendance. •Analytical reports for the entire Enroll to Encash cycle.

faqs.question: What is the "Enroll to Encash" cycle in mbas HR and Payroll?
faqs.answer: Enroll-to-Encash is a generic term used to encompass the business cycle that starts with enrolling of an employee and ends with the full and final settlement of an employee. There are several prerequisites and parameters involved within the Enroll-to-Encash cycle, including leave requisitions, overtime entries, income and deductions and maintenance of attendance till generation of salary sheet. Upon service termination of the employee, the system automatically generates a full and final settlement.

faqs.question: What is the time frame required for mbas service to be up and running for a customer?
faqs.answer: mbas point solutions take approximately one week to ten days for the customers to have the service up and running. •mbas point solutions come provided with organization and business configurators •Organization configurators guide the user/admin to set up organization-related global information along with user creation and security settings for users •Similarly, business configurators helps users to enter the prerequisites required for the processes to run •The business configurators include both the master and opening balance data which are prerequisites for the processes to run. •The system is provided with an uploading facility for data through pre-defined excel templates which can be filled with master data to be migrated to the mbas application •The online help will guide users to understand the way in which the data entry is to be done.

faqs.question: How do you ensure that the data is secured in mbas?
faqs.answer: • To achieve the economies of scale, mbas uses "multi-tenancy". Multi-tenancy allows multiple customers to run their application on the same unit of software. • The data is stored in one database. This makes the overall system scalable, simpler and lower in cost. • This may cause you to have some doubt about the security and safety of your data. However, any tier 4 technology data center, such as the one hosting this service, delivers complete security of data. The agreements made are legally binding and protect the business interests of all stakeholders.

faqs.question: How is mbas ERP superior to many other ERP vendors?
faqs.answer: Many ERP vendors with products using outdated technology will require a huge development cost and a complete rewrite to fully incorporate .NET. Many vendors will add minimal .NET functionality to claim that they use .Net in their products. mbas is very well positioned with .NET technology, and most important is E-Commerce Modules are in .NET.

faqs.question: What is Microsoft .NET? What?s in it for me?
faqs.answer: Microsoft .NET (pronounced ?dot net?) is a completely new development platform. This platform offers many tangible benefits for both manufacturing companies and ERP developers: The .NET insulates software developers from different operating systems so it is easier to deploy, install and maintain. It runs faster, is more secure and hacker-resistant The .NET platform makes it easier to leverage the Internet and conduct E-commerce with supply chain The .NET-based systems will reduce the cost of software ownership

faqs.question: On what Technology Platform is mbas ERP product developed?
faqs.answer: Our Products are developed on Original Microsoft . Net technology.

faqs.question: What are the different subscription modes of mbas?
faqs.answer: mbas has taken SaaS model to the next level. mbas provides both business specific and industry specific solutions hosted, hence the reason to term it as ?Managed Business Application Services? (mbas). It can be delivered to any required business segment - small, medium or large.

faqs.question: What is the difference between "SaaS" and "mbas"?
faqs.answer: mbas has taken SaaS model to the next level.mbas provides both business specific and industry specific solutions hosted, hence the reason to term it as ?Managed Business Application Services? (mbas). It can be delivered to any required business segment - small, medium or large.

faqs.question: How do you ensure that data is secured in mbas?
faqs.answer: To achieve the economies of scale, mbas uses "Multitenancy". Multitenancy makes customers to run their application on the same unit of software. The data is stored in one database. This makes overall system scalable, very easy with lower cost. There will be a definite doubt on losing the data or security of data. Today, any tier 4 technology data centers deliver security of data. The agreements made are legally binding and protect business interests of all stakeholders.

faqs.question: How does mbas function?
faqs.answer: A traditional software implementation involves purchasing and maintaining of servers, and installing and maintaining the software. mbas typically delivers solutions to customers and makes them to access the solution over the network (typically Internet or cloud computing). On subscribing mbas, you join a community which has the application at the center.

faqs.question: What are the most popular uses for mbas?
faqs.answer: mbas application is used in different business functions like Finance, Human Resources, Payroll, Inventory, Purchasing, and also Industry vertical applications for Trading, Retail, Manufacturing, Automotive and Public Sector.

faqs.question: Why should I consider mbas?
faqs.answer: bas (Managed Business Application Services) is an application that delivers to the customers, to access the solution over the network (typically Internet) and frees the customer (the end user) from maintenance, daily technical operations, recurring and increasing IT cost and infrastructure, support of software/up gradation.

faqs.question: What is "Order to Cash" cycle in mbas Order Management?
faqs.answer: Order-to-cash is a generic term used to encompass the business cycle that starts with reception of a customer sales order and ends with collection of accounts receivable generated in the sale of the final product. There are several sub-processes within the order-to-cash cycle, including receiving enquiries, entering sales orders, approving sales orders, delivering goods, invoicing for the orders and authorizing returns against sales invoices if required.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the mbas Order Management?
faqs.answer: • The business process module enables routing from one process to another • The process can be entered from first process to last process or it can be initiated from any in-between process • Facility to make multiple deliveries for sales order • Continuous tracking of lost sales based on the quotations sent and orders received • Analytical reports for the entire order to cash cycle

faqs.question: What is the time frame required for mbas service to up and run for a customer?
faqs.answer: mbas point solutions take approximately one week to ten days for the customer to have the service up and running • mbas point solutions provide organization and business configurators • The organization configurator guides the admin user to set up organization-related global information along with user creation and security settings for users • Similarly, the business configurator helps users enter the pre-requisites as required • The business configurators include both the master and opening balance data which are pre-requisites for the processes to run. • The system provides a data uploading facility using pre-defined Excel templates with which master data can be migrated to the mbas application • The online help will guide users to understand the way in which the data entry is to be done

faqs.question: How do you ensure that the data is secured in mbas?
faqs.answer: • To achieve the economies of scale, mbas uses "multi-tenancy". Multi-tenancy allows multiple customers to run their application on the same unit of software. • The data is stored in one database. This makes the overall system scalable, simpler and lower in cost. • This may cause you to have some doubt about the security and safety of your data. However, any tier 4 technology data center, such as the one hosting this service, delivers complete security of data. The agreements made are legally binding and protect the business interests of all stakeholders

faqs.question: How do you ensure that my data is secure in mbas?
faqs.answer: To achieve economies of scale, mbas uses "multi-tenancy". Multi-tenancy facilitates customers running their application on the same unit of software. The data is stored in one database. faqs.question: What is the time frame required for an mbas service to be up and running?
faqs.answer: mbas smart solutions take approximately one week to ten days for the customer to get them up and running. mbas smart solutions come provided with an Organization and a Business configurator. The Organization Configurator guides the user/admin to set up organization-related global information along with user creation and security settings for users. The Business Configurator facilitates the entry of both master and opening balance data which are pre-requisites for the processes to run. The system is provided with an upload facility for data via pre-defined excel templates. The online help will guide users to understand exactly how to populate the data for a successful migration to the mbas application.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the mbas Smart Trading?
faqs.answer: Monitors inbound and outbound logistics leading to reductions in operating cost. Reduced procurement cycle time and increased productivity. Simple data feeds and analytical reports for the entire order to cash cycle. Flexible payroll configuration and country specific salary sheet generation. Easy to maintain accounting with GL, AR, AP and FY closure. Integration across application processes and automatic posting from other modules.

faqs.question: What added advantages does the mbas Smart Trading solution bring to the enterprise?
faqs.answer: The trading industry operates in an extremely competitive environment and strives to meet profitability goals by adhering to legal and social standards and regulations. Therein lies the need for a system that integrates multiple business functions to help streamline the basic operations of the organization. The mbas Smart Trading solution is that system. It is easy to configure with enhanced usability and real-time information that is greatly beneficial to its users along with enhanced transparency, control, agility, communication and information availability. These are all added advantages for the enterprises.
